name: Police Car Driving Simulator . Racing the Robbers
name_original: Police Car Driving Simulator . Racing the Robbers
description:
Hurry up policeman! There was a robbery at 23rd Street and you are the only one able to catch the thieves. Put on your uniform, turn on the police car´s siren, and chase those criminals. Today you have a special permission to break all the rules you want!

Realistic police cars
Feel like a real cop in this racing game. The more criminals you arrest, the better police cars you get! Collect them all!

Full speed racing game
We do not want those thieves to escape with the loot, right? push down the accelerator, dodge traffic and explore the city in this frenzy race. But be careful and do not crash the police car or your boss will get mad at you!

Epic scenario
Become a real New York Policeman. Explore the streets, drive through the city while enjoying the spectacular sounds. Put your police car at top speed, just because you are the law now!

Go on agent, your city needs you!

Twitter: @Oscarminigames
